name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sales Engagement Tool powered by AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your KPI struggle with our unified dashboard, advanced automation and AI personalization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 LIMITED OFFER! ➡️ Sign up today and receive 20 personalization tokens per month for free.


----
1️⃣ Channels Aggregation 
----
Now, all your team's prospect activities are aggregated in one dashboard. This allows for swift, data-driven decision making.

You can aggregate events from Email, Linkedin activities, Phone calls, Messengers, etc. 

----
2️⃣ Personalized Messaging 
----
🚀 Ensure meaningful engagements every time that align with your goals and incorporate your unique messaging style. 🎯

🔍 Our AI technology analyzes communication and contact context within seconds, allowing you to hook your potential customers with ease on LinkedIn. 🎣

Powered by GPT-4 (OpenAI / ChatGPT) technology, scope.money brings highly personalized and engaging messages to your outreach campaigns. Our advanced AI capabilities ensure that your communication stands out, making every interaction count. 🌟

📊 Our intuitive dashboard promotes seamless team collaboration, organizes LinkedIn outreach workflows, and helps you evaluate your team's traction effectively. With scope.money, you can easily analyze genuine conversions, identify bottlenecks, and adapt your tactics accordingly. 📈

🔧 Installing the scope.money Chrome plugin is a breeze! Just a few clicks and you'll have access to the ultimate AI copilot for your LinkedIn sales outreach efforts, right within your browser. 🌐

💼 So, what are you waiting for? Level up your LinkedIn sales game and achieve more than ever with the scope.money Chrome plugin! 💪

🎉 Join the revolution and download the scope.money Chrome plugin today for an extraordinary LinkedIn sales outreach experience! 🌟

----
3️⃣ Workflow Automation
----
Experience comprehensive sequences and tasks that automatically close using triggers, saving you time and reducing the chances of facing any issues.


#####

🤝🏽 scope.money is designed for: 
- sales professionals: SDR (sales development reps), AE (Account Executive) and etc.
- marketers, 
- freelancers, 
- entrepreneurs, 
- businesses of all sizes looking to elevate their LinkedIn sales outreach efforts.
